line: You feel a surge of power from the dark tome.
The Twin Chalice Tavern is downstairs.
Darkness emanates from a book lying on the ground.
A dark passage leads west from here.
A doorway flanked by stone warriors is east.
To the south is the inn hallway.
Wide steps of stone lead up.
The steps spiral further up, or down.
The jagged rocks rise up in a wall that prevents you from going further.
Steep cliffs of rock rise up out of the mist before you.
Treacherous rocks in the mist prevent your passage in this direction.
To the west is the Nicolellis Suite.
The Sea is north.
There is a boat of gleaming white resting on the shore here.
You climb aboard the ivory boat.
The Sea is very cold and deep. You will need a boat to cross it...
Your boat of white is too heavy to carry inland...
Your boat is too heavy for you to carry inland...better leave it here.
I am Ranlhach, the God of perpetuality.
e
The Ocean waves roughly throw you back to shore!
You may go EAST to get right into the thick of things!
You wander aimlessly in the Void.
You wander aimlessly in the Void.
You wander aimlessly in the Void.
You wander aimlessly in the Void.
You wander aimlessly in the Void.
To the south is the lewis bakery.
A doorway flanked by two stone warriors leads west.
You are unable to breach this doors magical defense!
To the west is the inn office.
The corridor continues to the east and to the west...
You are burned horribly beyond recognition by a fireball !!
Someone just got pounded--hard...
You drop the key down a small chute by the door.
You see a dark shadow hovering above the ground.
A chamber lies west.
You unleash unholy fire!
Grey hills fill the eastern horizon..
The City of the Gods lay west. Sanctuary may be found there.
The Twin Chalice Inn is upstairs.
The gates of Tai-Tastigon are closed!
The gates of Tai-Tastigon are closed!
A frosty ball of death flies through the room.
The door is stuck!
As you drop #, it disappears in mists.
A crowded square is north.
A ball of acid strikes someone in the room, burning him horribly!
Terrible magic is at work here.
You see a bright knife covered in blood and the agony of its victim!
Hands scrabble at a dark hole at your feet!
The western road leads to Tai-tastigon.
A grey expanse stretches out all around you..
You can see what seems to be a settlement to the south.
Zortek the zombie, the next step after grad school
Darkness gathers to the north.
The land around you is unchanging and uncompromising.
You see shadows gliding in the corners of the room.
You can see city walls in the distant west.
You see # standing by the distant gates..
The entrance to the main building is south.
Grey hills surround you..
A shattered house lay to your west.
The settlement center is north.
An irregular crack in the east wall allows passage.
I'm a drag queen.  So EAT it, BITCH!!!!
There seems to be a stair to the east.
Light emanates from the north.
The Ocean is that way!
A small pinprick of light can be seen far above.
You may exit the shop to the east.
A cry of anguish winds around you...
A mighty structure of earth and wood is west.
You see a great hall in the darkness from the south.
There is a child sobbing somewhere near....please help her..
There is no way through here!
Forest critters can be heard all around.
The earth repels you!
Your hand becomes numb as it closes over the faintly glowing knife..
There is a light on the ground at your feet.
There is a pile of snakes writhing towards you!
There is a book bound in pale leather here.
# can be seen at the base of the structure.
The War Dance is north.
To the south is a green door made of crystal.
A door seemingly carved from a red wood that flows like blood is east.
A stone slab covers the western exit.
You hear faint hissing noises coming from the south.
You feel like you are being watched...
To the north is a void that whispers to you. Dare cross the threshold.
The War Dance is south.
The gravestones in this section of the graveyard are unmarked.
Gloomy hills are south.
The War Dance is west.
The War Dance is east.
There are arched passages to the south and west.
The trail continues to the east and to the west...
You have the feeling you are being watched.
You will burn yourself if you touch that!
There is a flickering flame dancing before your eyes..
The stone is too heavy to lift!
There is a large stone pillar before you.
On the ground here is a large black mace.
You feel a surge of magical power permeate your being!
You cannot leave this room with the Rune!
Muffled cries can be heard from the west.
A scroll hangs before you.
The only exit lies east, towards more sorry-looking vegetation.
You cannot leave with the object of power!
A power holds you back! You must not leave with the Rune!
You are hit by a wave of unholy fire !!
Big trees are west.
Away with you, vile Unbeliever!
A dark gateway to the west marks the entrance to lower town.
Some half hidden steps lead down.
The stairs lead both up and down.
A passage leads south.
If only this forest would end...
Upwards is a highway to the Hall of Gods.
A calm, deep lake is north.
Swamp, swamp everywhere.
Dark forest is all around.
If only this forest would end...
Huge trees are all around you.
You could jump into another building to the south.
Strange figures are dragging an object along the ground to the west.
The mountain gate is to the west.
The trail continues east and west.
The eastern path leads to darkness..
The beastie has the word "demonlord" written across his forehead.
Hovering seemingly of its own accord is a strange glowing staff.
Huge trees are all around.
The Great Redwood completely blocks passage south!
The rest of the square lies west, east and south.
The gates of the cemetery bar your egress west.
You have found a hidden doorway leading west.
There might be another way out if you search for it.
You may follow the beach east.
You tumble down the trail!
Gloomy hills are north.
Upon uttering the long forgotten words you are transformed...
You Dropped a # here.
A giant crocodile bites your leg off!!
Even the graveyard seems quieter than normal.
The gates around the tomb area prevent your passage north.
The gates around the tomb area prevent your passage south.
You stand before a Monster operator (tm). Caution is advised...
you cannot go that way!
A low passage leads south.
There is another passage leading west.
Nasty woods are all about.
Foul woodlands surround you.
A sliding stone in the arch comes crashing down on your head!
Tyviar the Ogre's spiked club hits you very hard!
Tyviar the Ogre's spiked club hits you very hard!
Jorlock the Giant's iron mallet hits you with incredible force!!
Jorlock the Giant's iron mallet hits you with incredible force!!
Flying sparks hit you!!
Orguzar the Fire Giant's huge ass sword creams your little body!!
Orguzar the Fire Giant's huge ass sword creams your little body!!
A giant bat swoops down on you!
A dart shoots out of the wall and hits you!
A shadowy warrior jumps out from the shadows and chops your arm off!!
A very large cavern is west.

A magical blast of energy hits you in the chest!!
Ippulet the Beastmaster's flail beats the shit out you!

Ippulet the Beastmaster's flail beats the shit out of you!

A mondo ferret lunches on your arm!
You feel weaker from the noxious fumes in this area...
The door is stuck!
You feel weaker...
Nystrek the bugbear's pike hits you with incredible force!
The door is stuck!
The door is covered with nasty slime!
A large chamber is west.
The door is covered with acidic slime! You have been burned!
Bog slurping noises are all around.
Strange trees extend in all directions.
Dark trees attempt to surround you to the west, north, and south.
A forboding cave mouth lies north.
Thick forest is east of here.
A faint trail through the forest may lie south of here.
A gulley is west.
A ravine is west.
The ravine runs into a forested gulley to the south.
Dense forest lies north and south of the trail.
The trail continues to the west.
More light is visible through the trees to the east.
Dense forest lies north.
A clump of hills rise out of the forest twilight south of here.
The trail continues to the east and west.
Some steps lead up.
This place is spooky.
Thick forests lie east of here.
The forest thins to the south.
The hint of mountains peeking through the forest can be seen north.
The sounds of rushing water can be heard coming from the west.
A faint trail leaves this area to the east.
The ground slopes downward to the north.
Imposing megaliths jut out of the forest to the south.
A faint trail may lie north.
Tall oaks are east.
A series of low mounds rise to the west.
A dense forest of Cedar trees lies south of here.
A group of ancient stones jut out of the trees to the west.
Cedar trees are south and east of here.
A faint trail may lie to the north.
A group of grassy knolls are east.
Dark woods are all around.
A clearing is north of here..
An impressive array of gargantuan stones is south.
Impassable rocks are that way!
A clearing is east of here.
Impassable rocks are that way!
Man-eating weeds are that way!
Dark trees are east.
A line of megaliths leads north from here.
Swamp and marshland lies south, east, and west from here.
An towering megalithic arrangement is north.
Thicker forest mingles with swamp to the south and east.
Dark marshes are west.
Mountainous stones jut out of the swamp to the east.
You can't drag that boat along!
The exit to this smoky shop is west.

You move some branches around uncovering a path leading north.
You feel better.
You eat some herbs, and mumble a folk-remedy.
A small clearing may lie north.
Follow the Will of Sataki, or suffer a fate worse than death!
The earth starts shaking damaging your opponents!
You may CHANGE YOUR CLASS down from here.
Go UP when you are done selecting a class.
Fens are north of here.
The gallery runs to the north and south.
Small arches lead off the balcony in the 4 main directions.
A solid door is north.
A long gallery is south.
You may exit the throne room to the south.
The central balcony is north.
# stares deeply into the mirror, and is transformed!
Go *UP* when you are done selecting a class.
Type GNOLL to become a Gnoll.
The forest seems somewhat brighter to the east.
Thick, tangled woods lie both north and south of here.
Type TEMPLAR to become a Templar.

the guy who just wants to learn.. =)
A huge monster bites your head off!
# masturbates furiously.

You Look Upon Your Death
There is a long bladed weapon on the ground.
You uncover an exit leading north!
You find a covered path leading into the forest to the north.
This scimitar ahs a long curved blade, good for slashing opponents.
A rocky shore, backed by heavy woods, if south.
A shimmer of light lies above.
A boat of druidic origin rests here.
As # leaves east, the unstable roof caves in upon them.

Raucus reveling can be heard to the west.
The main gate is east.
A doorway leads in each of the cardinal directions.

A parapet runs atop the fortifications south and west of here.

You may enter a tower to the north, as well as another to the south.
You may enter a tower to the east, as well as another to the west.
A tower lies both north and south of here.

Solid doors lead to the ramparts to the north, and to the west.

A gleaming poisonous thorn appears in your hand.
A dark thorn pierces your heart!
You hear a cry of agony!
Your incantation has failed!
A burning vice clutches your heart! Flames rip through your flesh!
A glowing hand of fire hangs before you, burnig your eyes!
Your incantations have failed!
A crocodile munches on your foot before you can escape!!
You send a flurry of blazing arrows of pain after your prey!
You are struck by a magical arrow!
A glowing arrow strikes someone in the room.
Your incantation has failed! Argh!
A croc gnaws at your legs before you can get away!!
A giant wave of magical water slams into you!!

Bruniak the Gnome king's war hammer crushes your skull!
You can't get the door open!

The stench here weakens you!
